component.name: ReadCount
component.doc: This component counts reads in a sliding window. Input is a string of .bedweight files. It considers read weights.

output.name: out_dir
output.doc: Where to write the output to.

output.name: intermediate
output.doc: Directory for intermediate files, like parameter yaml file etc...

parameter.name: infiles_string
parameter.doc: A string containing file paths separated by spaces.

parameter.name: chrominfo
parameter.doc: path to a chromosome info file

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.doc: Verbose mode is turned on in default mode. To change this write verbose="" in workflow.and.

parameter.name: weight
parameter.doc: Is there any weight for the reads. Default is yes. To turn off write weight="" in workflow.and.

parameter.name: pythonPATH
parameter.doc: Python to use for execution. If none is given, python from environment will be taken.
